hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh
VERSION=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "cd /opt/tcserver/dai_etl_feeder; jar xf dai-etl-feeder.jar META-INF/MANIFEST.MF; grep Implementation-Version META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'; rm -fR META-INF"`
print Gathering build version to be deployed print -------------------------------------- print print Deploying version ${VERSION} print print
cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts ./deployjar.sh -a dai-etl-feeder -t dai-etl-feeder -e 10.13.18.115 -r ${VERSION} -v
